articles.title: Gut microbiome remodeling induced by microplastic exposure in humans.
articles.summary: Microplastic exposure alters gut microbiome composition, potentially increasing risk of gastrointestinal diseases by reducing beneficial bacteria and short-chain fatty acid production.

articles.title: The colloidal stability of albumin-based drug delivery systems has a profound effect on tumoricidal activity.
articles.summary: Enhanced HSA-PLA nanoparticles with improved colloidal stability showed superior paclitaxel delivery and antitumor efficacy compared to Abraxane in cancer treatment.

articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary:
Here's a concise summary in one clear sentence:

Manipulating the gut microbiome through specific interventions like fecal transplantation may improve immunotherapy responses in urothelial carcinoma patients.

articles.title: Effects of estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene on human temporal lobe cortex astroglial cell spreading.
articles.summary: Estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene significantly alter the spreading behavior of astrocytes in human temporal lobe brain tissue, potentially impacting neuronal connectivity.
